class.name: PIXI.AjaxRequest
class.help: A wrapper for ajax requests to be handled cross browser

public.name: canUseNewCanvasBlendModes
public.help: Checks whether the Canvas BlendModes are supported by the current browser

public.name: getNextPowerOfTwo

returns.help: the closest number that is a power of two

public.help: Given a number, this function returns the closest number that is a power of two\nthis function is taken from Starling Framework as its pretty neat ;)

public.name: hex2rgb
public.help: Converts a hex color number to an [R, G, B] array

public.name: requestAnimationFrame
public.help: A polyfill for requestAnimationFrame\nYou can actually use both requestAnimationFrame and requestAnimFrame,\nyou will still benefit from the polyfill

public.name: rgb2hex
public.help: Converts a color as an [R, G, B] array to a hex number
